name: Monique Raymond
text: Great selections! Better prices! Huge parking lot, clean and cool inside. Staff always friendly and fast. I love the salad selection too. Most payments excepted including Food Stamps.

name: Beau C
text:
I'm from Chicago so i grew up eating great pizza.

For being in Oklahoma, I'm surprised to say this location makes yummy, fresh, ‚Ä¶More

name: Joyce Fusco
text: I love having  fresh baked pizza when we are ready to eat.  Great pizza. The only pizza we eat.. BUT WE WANT TO BE ABLE TO HAVE THE TACO PIZZA MORE OFTEN. LOVE IT..

name: D Vanlehn
text: My husband was just diagnosed with cancer, and for what ever reason this is one of the few  Things that does NOT make him deathly ill. The crew was so nice to split 2 pizzas into 4 so he can have 1/2 at a time. Thank you guys!

name: April Haynie
text: Great food Great price Great staff what more do I need to say Recommended

name: David Pemberton
text: This is for the Yukon location. My mom had to have a light procedure done so she had been fasting for the anesthesia. She was really craving Papa Murphy's pizza. So after I got her home and settled in i head out to get her Papa Murphy's. ‚Ä¶More

name: heather durbin
text: The pizza was great!  The price was good and the employees were very friendly.  We will definitely be back!

name: James W
text: Not too bad next to family move rental store. They have the instructions for how to cook the pizza. It's just a little easier to buy pre cooked. Price is a little on the high side.

name: K Bizzle
text: Fast friendly and close to my job so I can pick up on my way home at the end of the day. The people there let me take my time and I didn't feel rushed into a decision. I like the options they have for ingredients. It was my first time going ‚Ä¶More

name: Danielle Cambron
text: Great pizza at great prices! The crew is always friendly and helpful with suggestions when I get bored with my pizza selection they never stear me wrong.

name: Kevin Winstead
text: Rather bake it myself than wait for it.    Ingredients fresh and lots to choose from.   Staff is speedy and very friendly.   This location has a drive thru window for calling or using their app ahead to order.

name: Matt Duane
text: One of the better papa murphys in the area. I actually drive all the way o ER to this one from Midwest City because the MC facility is nasty and the employees are useless. So far I've been very pleased with the service.

name: Jacob Nolan
text: This Papa Murphy's was better last year and the year before I haven't lived here in this area for very long but they are quick to minute to five minute drive from my house and neighborhood and they deliver fresh ingredients on a wholesome ‚Ä¶More

name: Kathy Davis
text: I really love their pizza. Fresh ingredients, great staff, awesome salads and you can bake it when your ready. It's a good idea if you want to only cook half the pizza and freeze the other half.

name: Sohayla Samimi
text: Yummy pizza! They pile on the toppings and you can taste the freshness. It really makes a difference. The staff is friendly helpful and upbeat.Great to have a location in Yukon!

name: Amanda Anonymous
text: Amazing pizza and amazing service! Every time we come here we are always treated so nicely and you really can't go wrong with the pizzas!

name: Justin Hennessey
text: Great alternative when you don't really feel like preparing dinner.

name: Daughter of The King
text: My favorite are the stuffed üçï. Every time(once a week) always so delicious!!!

name: Matthew Sullivan
text: I always get a great pie from these guys. I always ask for a pint of their pizza sauce and they never have a problem.

name: James DelPierre
text: Fresh as can be. Best tasting pizza

name: Kristen Roberts
text: The stuffed pizza is very flavorful and taste so fresh! You can't beat $10 Tuesday's!

name: Ray Newcomb
text: Danielle and Rob Always Toss my Salad Perfectly ! Best I have ever had .

name: Brittney Herrmann
text: I just came and ordered my family dinner and as I was sitting here I overheard a manager telling an employee how much they appreciate him and all his hard work. We have always had amazing food here but to also know they treat their employees well is a breath of fresh air.

name: Heather Dunn
text: Quick service. Delicious pizza. We go here weekly.

name: Rhonda Johnson
text: Good quality meat, sauce, and extras.  Love it.  Hot out of your own oven. Salads, desserts, and fresh  food.

name: Nathan Berry
text: Always pleasant experience. Orders are correct, fast, and fresh. So convenient to grab, go, bake at home. LOVE. IS. 425F.

name: Doug Huchteman
text: Great pizza you bake at home.  Much better than the big chain pizzas for so good price

name: Robert Walker
text: Perfect place I get a bite to eat fresh ingredients friendly people.

name: Michelle Zelms
text: Have been a customer for four years and now an employee love the food the people and place! üòÇ

text: Best pizza in town. My fav is stuffed all meat pizza. Two slices and I'm stuffed.

name: Marsha Lay
text: love it... no more other pizza will satisfy me...

name: Noah-Does-Stuff
text: Rude employees came in to figure out a free large pizza promotion code, the cashier lady started talking to me disrespectfully like I was stupid, and asked us if we were sure that my service dog was a service dog. Will not return here

name: Bailey Bailey
text: Love Papa Murphy's!  They are always fast, friendly, and efficient.

name: Travis Lane
text: Getting as expensive as delivery.  Think I will pass going forward.

name: Steven Rycroft
text: Best pizza I have had since Godfather's!!

name: Gail Clark
text: Moved from Bethany. Kept same phone number. Didn't know moved till went to pick up pizza. Had to find new place in Yukon in pouring rain. No more Murphy's.

name: Rabid Wombat King
text: THE FOOD IS GOOD AND THE PRICES USED TO BE OK, BUT THEY HAVE INCREASED THEIR PRICES MORE THAN MOST COMPANIES I KNOW. THE STAFF IS FRIENDLY BUT I HAVE SEEN THE OWNERS BERATE THEIR EMPLOYEES OVER VERY SMALL THINGS AND WOULD NOT GIVE THEM ANY ‚Ä¶More

text: How can you charge as much as a normal pizza place when you don't even cook it so the price of you having to buy stoves and the energy to run those stoves should come out of that pizza but yet y'all are still charging the same price that every other pizza place charges which makes no accept me that is what you call robbery
